Verses: 1 isravele, Kel: Nee Ippozhudhu Yordhaanaik Kadandhu, Unnilum Janam Peruththadhum Balaththadhumaana Jaadhigalaith Thuraththi, Vaanaththaiyalaaviya Madhil Soozhndha Periya Pattanangalaip Pidiththu,

2 enaakkin Puththiraraagiya Periyavargalum Netiyavargalumaana Janangalaith Thuraththividappogiraai; Ivargal Seydhiyai Nee Arindhu, Enaak Puththirarukku Munbaaga Nirpavan Yaar Endru Sollappaduvadhai Nee Kettirukkiraai.

3 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakku Munbaagak Kadandhupogiravar Enbadhai Indru Ariyakkadavaai; Avar Patchikkira Akkiniyaippola Avargalai Azhippaar; Avargalai Unakku Munbaaga Vizhappannuvaar; Ivvidhamaaik Karththar Unakkuch Sonnabadiye, Nee Avargalaich Seekkiramaaith Thuraththi, Avargalai Azhippaai.

4 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Avargalai Unakku Munbaagaththuraththugaiyil, Nee Un Irudhayaththile: En Needhiyinimiththam Indha Dhesaththaich Sudhandhariththukkollumbadi Karththar Ennai Azhaiththuvandhaar Endru Sollaayaaga; Andha Jaadhigaludaiya Aagaamiyaththinimiththame Karththar Avargalai Unakku Munbaagath Thuraththi Vidugiraar.

5 un Needhiyinimiththamum Un Irudhayaththinudaiya Uththamaththinimiththamum Nee Avargal Dhesaththaich Sudhandharikkumbadi Piravesippadhillai; Andha Jaadhigaludaiya Aagaamiyaththinimiththamaagavum, Aabiragaam Eesaakku Yaakkobu Ennum Un Pidhaakkalukkuk Karththar Aanaiyittuch Sonna Vaarththaiyai Niraivetrumbadiyaagavum, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Avargalai Unakku Munbaagath Thuraththividugiraar.
6 aagaiyaal, Un Needhiyinimiththam Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakku Andha Nalla Dhesaththaich Sudhandharikkakkodaar Enbadhai Ariyakkadavaai; Nee Vanangaak Kazhuththulla Janam.

7 nee Vanaandharaththil Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkuk Kadungobam Undaakkinadhai Ninai, Adhai Maravaayaaga; Neengal Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappatta Naal Mudhal, Ivvidaththil Vandhu Serumattum, Karththarukku Virodhamaaik Kalagampannineergal.
8 orebilum Neengal Karththarukkuk Kadungobam Undaakkinadhinaal, Karththar Ungalai Azhikkaththakkadhaana Ukkirangondaar.

9 karththar Ungalode Pannina Udanbadikkaip Palagaigalaagiya Karpalagaigalaip Petrukkollumbadi Naan Malaiyil Erinapodhu, Naarpadhunaal Iravum Pagalum Malaiyil Thangi Appam Pusiyaamalum Thanneer Kudiyaamalum Irundhen.

10 appozhudhu Dhevanudaiya Viralinaal Ezhudhiyirundha Irandu Karpalagaigalaik Karththar Ennidaththil Oppukkoduththaar; Sabai Koodiyirundha Naalil Karththar Malaiyile Akkiniyin Naduvilirundhu Ungaludane Pesina Vaarththaigalinbadiye Avaigalil Ezhudhiyirundhadhu.
11 iravum Pagalum Naarpadhunaal Mudindhu, Karththar Enakku Andha Udanbadikkaiyin Irandu Karpalagaigalaik Kodukkirapodhu,

12 karththar Ennai Nokki: Nee Ezhundhu, Seekkiramaai Ivvitam Vittu, Irangippo; Nee Ekipdhilirundhu Azhaiththukkontuvandha Un Janangal Thangalaik Ketuththukkontaarkal; Naan Avarkalukku Vidhiththa Vazhiyai Avarkal Seekkiramaaka Vittu Vilaki, Vaarppikkappatta Vikkirakaththaith Thangalukkaaka Untaakkinaarkal Endraar.
13 pinnum Karththar Ennai Nokki: Indha Janangalaip Paarththen; Adhu Vanangaak Kazhuththulla Janam.

14 aagaiyaal, Naan Avargalai Azhiththu, Avargal Perai Vaanaththinkeezh Atruppogappannumbadi, Nee Ennai Vittuvidu; Avargalaippaarkkilum Unnaip Balaththadhum Janam Peruththadhumaana Jaadhiyaakkuven Endraar.
15 appozhudhu Naan Thirumbi Malaiyilirundhu Iranginen, Malaiyaanadhu Akkini Patri Erindhukondirundhadhu; Udanbadikkaiyin Irandu Palagaigalum En Irandu Kaigalilum Irundhadhu.

16 naan Paarththapodhu, Neengal Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Virodhamaagap Paavanjeydhu, Vaarppikkappatta Kandrukkuttiyai Ungalukku Undaakki, Karththar Ungalukku Vidhiththa Vazhiyaich Seekkiramaai Vittu Vilaginadhaik Kanden.
17 appozhudhu Naan En Irandu Kaigalilum Irundha Andha Irandu Palagaigalaiyum Ongi Erindhu, Avaigalai Ungal Kangalukku Munpaaga Udaiththuppotten.

18 karththaraik Kobappaduththuvadharku Neengal Avarudaiya Samugaththil Pollaappuch Seydhu Nadappiththa Ungaludaiya Sagala Paavangal Nimiththamum, Naan Karththarukku Munbaaga Munpolum Iravum Pagalum Naarpadhunaal Vizhundhukidandhen; Naan Appam Pusikkavumillai, Thanneer Kudikkavumillai.
19 karththar Ungalai Azhikkumbadi Ungalmel Kondirundha Kobaththirkum Ukkiraththirkum Bayandhirundhen; Karththar Andha Muraiyum En Mandraattaik Kettaar.
20 aaronmelum Karththar Migavum Kobangondu, Avanai Azhikkavendumendrirundhaar; Appozhudhu Aaronukkaagavum Vinnappampanninen.
21 ungal Paavakkiriyaiyaagiya Andhak Kandrukkuttiyai Naan Eduththu Akkiniyil Eriththu, Adhai Norukki, Thoolaaippogumattum Araiththu, Andhath Thoolai Malaiyilirundhu Odugira Aatrile Pottuvitten.
22 thaperaavilum, Maasaavilum, Kiprodh Aththaavaavilum Karththarukkuk Kadungobam Undaakkineergal.

23 neengal Poi, Naan Ungalukkuk Koduththa Dhesaththaich Sudhandhariththukkollungal Endru Karththar Kaadhesparneyaavilirundhu Ungalai Anuppugaiyilum, Neengal Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Visuvaasiyaamalum, Avarudaiya Saththaththukkuch Sevikodaamalum, Avarudaiya Vaakkukku Virodhamaaik Kalagampannineergal.
24 naan Ungalai Arindha Naalmudharkondu, Neengal Karththarukku Virodhamaagak Kalakampannugiravargalaayirundheergal.
25 karththar Ungalai Azhippen Endru Sonnabadiyinaal, Naan Munpol Karththarin Samugaththil Iravum Pagalum Naarpadhunaal Vizhundhukidandhen; Appozhudhu Naan Karththarai Nokkip Pannina Vinnappamaavadhu:

26 karththaraagiya Aandavare, Dhevareer Ummudaiya Magaththuvaththinaale Meettu, Balaththa Kaiyinaal Egipthilirundhu Konduvandha Umadhu Janaththaiyum, Umadhu Sudhandharaththaiyum Azhikkaadhiruppeeraaga.

27 karththar Avaraglukku Vaakkuththaththampanniyirundha Dhesaththil Avargalaip Piravesikkappannak Koodaamalponapadiyinaalum, Avargalai Veruththabadiyinaalum, Avargalai Vanaandharaththil Kondrupodumbadikke Konduvandhaar Endru Naangal Vittup Purappadumbadi Neer Seydha Dhesaththin Kudigal Sollaadhapadikku,
28 dhevareer Indha Janangalin Murattaattaththaiyum, Ivargal Aagaamiyaththaiyum, Ivargal Paavaththaiyum Paaraamal, Umadhu Dhaasaraagiya Aabiragaam Eesaakku Yaakkobu Enbavargalai Ninaiththarulum.
29 neer Umadhu Magaa Balaththinaalum, Ongiya Puyaththinaalum Purappadappannina Ivargal Umadhu Janamum Umadhu Sudhandharamumaayirukkiraargale Endru Vinnappampanninen.
